title: Tire Pressure Regulator Hype Hits Gravel Worlds with Launch of New System: Is Paris-Roubaix Next?
content:
Marianne Vos used a redeveloped Gravaa regulator when she won gravel worlds. Will it help push tire pressure pumps onto the pav√© of the spring classics?
